flavorText: Bores ruin a party. Boars are party to ruin.
name: Crashing Boars
originalText: Whenever Crashing Boars attacks, defending player chooses an untapped creature he or she controls. That creature blocks Crashing Boars this turn if able.

rulings.text: If the chosen creature is not still untapped at the time blockers are declared, it does not have to block.
The ability is not optional. If there are no untapped creatures to choose, then the ability does nothing.

text: Whenever Crashing Boars attacks, defending player chooses an untapped creature they control. That creature blocks Crashing Boars this turn if able.
